title: The Lego Movie directors are making a TV show out of the Serial podcast
text:
The Lego Movie directors are making a TV show out of the Serial podcast 
Published By: Geek.com - Today 
The podcast phenomena that was Serial, created by This American Life producers and reporters Sarah Koenig and Julie Snyder is going to end u...
